description: Urdu InPage is a Windows program that allows users to create text documents in many different languages. Primarily, users use InPage to create documents written in Urdu.
NOTE: While a "Mac" version of InPage exists, it can be run only using the CrossOver Mac application, which allows Mac users to run Windows applications on their Mac.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .inp file in Microsoft Visual Studio Code 1.76
images.caption: INP file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code 1.76
